# your code goes here
m,n = map(int,raw_input().split())
a = []
for _ in range(m):
	a.append(map(int,raw_input().split()))

flag = 1
for i in range(m):
	for j in range(n):
		if j > 0:
			if a[i][j-1] != a[i][j]:
				flag = 0
				break
		if i > 0:
			if a[i-1][j] == a[i][j]:
				flag = 0
				break
		
	if flag == 0:
		break

if flag == 0:
	print "NO"
else:
	print "YES"
